products.title: MEGA DEATH
products.body_html:
Inspired by the legacy of the Black Snowboard of Death, yet custom designed for an unmatched ultralight and powerful performing ride, we present the MEGA DEATH — a high-end, high-tech freeride machine unlike anything else. The MEGA DEATH is quite simply the board that everyone wants, but not everyone will get to have. A truly versatile, high-performance freeride machine – ready to charge anything you dare point down.

The Mega Death is a series unlike anything else. Ultra-premium and ultra-featherweight, this series features the pinnacle of technical advancements from The MotherShip™. This beast of a board will propel you to unimaginable speeds with its Thermopolymer Starship Core™ wrapped in Pure Megacarbon™ and MEGADRIVE™ XT base with factory-direct Moonshot Omni Tune™ stone grind.

products.title: D.O.A.
products.body_html:
The Defenders of Awesome is so mind-bogglingly award-winning that if it entered the intergalactic snowboarding Olympics, it would effortlessly bag a gold in every parallel dimension. It's not just our top-selling snowboard; it's the snowboard that doubles as a sentient being, offering sage advice on the meaning of snowboarding and the universe.

The D.O.A. achieves its iconic and award-winning performance through a lightweight, durable, and poppy P2 Superlight™ Core. New for 2025, the D.O.A.’s Hybrid HolySheet™ is directly interwoven with Carbon Boosters for a precise, featherweight construction.

DOA

doa

products.title: MEGA MERC
products.body_html:
Behold! The consummate anytime, any-place, all-terrain, snow-slaying device; The MEGA MERC. Inspired by the on-slope versatility of the Mercury series, the MEGA MERC mimics its proven technical design lines while packing a powerful punch of serious construction upgrades. Designed for power when you want it, and float when you need it, the MEGA MERC is the ultimate, ultra-premium, shred-anything snowboard you can trust to handle it all.

Ultralight and ultra-versatile, the Mega Merc harnesses its 3D Thermopolymer Starship Core™ with an all-new Hybrid Holy-Sheet™ Tri/Tri MEGACARBON™ configuration and MEGADRIVE™ XT base for unparalleled all-mountain performance.

products.title: MERCURY
products.body_html:
The Mercury will get you into and out of every possible situation. This award-winning series is renowned for all-terrain versatility, from powder and kickers to side hits and park laps.

The Mercury is designed for power when you want it and float when you need it. With this board, there's no need to check the weather report because it can handle it all. Featuring a paulownia and poplar Hover Core™, among many other technical attributes like Amplitex™ V-Tech Amplifiers, the Mercury's durability and ollie power reign supreme.

products.title: SUPER D.O.A.
products.body_html:
Bear witness to the technically supreme, supercharged, SUPER D.O.A. redesigned for 2026 with a new 3D shape.

This game-changing, turbocharged wonder of the slopes has absorbed the shaping and camber theory of one of the most beloved snowboards in the galaxy and cranked up the construction to "Don't Panic" levels.

Designed for the intermediate to advanced all-terrain resort rider seeking the award-winning geometry of the D.O.A. series in a lighter, more energetic, and responsive chassis, the SUPER D.O.A. isn't just any snowboard; it's a hyperdrive equipped, improbability-fueled snow-surfing machine that can help you go faster, and edge quicker.

Ultra-premium, lightweight, powerful and fast, the SUPER D.O.A. is built with a featherweight Hybrid HolySheet™ Tri/Tri SuperCarbon™ configuration combined with a HyperDrive™ ADV XT base with factory-direct Moonshot Omni-Tune™ taking this already coveted series to new heights. Retaining award-winning perimeter geometry, the SUPER D.O.A. features an all-new Thermopolymer Starship Core with re-engineered 3D contouring, further enhancing its performance and versatility.

products.title: BIRDS OF A FEATHER
products.body_html:
The Birds of a Feather is a women’s specific technical adaptation of the best-selling D.O.A. series. It delivers the legendary performance of one of the world's most coveted snowboards, refined with flex patterns and geometric sizing to cater to women's specific riding preferences. The Birds of a Feather is a versatile, all-encompassing snowboard, ready to revolutionize your snowboarding experience and empower you to ride anywhere and conquer anything.

The Birds of a Feather achieves award-winning performance through a lightweight, durable, and poppy P2 Superlight™ Core. New for 2025, the Bird’s Hybrid HolySheet™ is directly interwoven with Carbon Boosters for a precise, featherweight construction.

products.title: DARK HORSE
products.body_html:
The Dark Horse is a new wallet-friendly iteration of the team-favorite Outsiders that crushes park jumps, side hits, and freestyle features. Pared down with only technical components you need in an array of standard and wide sizes – Dark Horse leverages its dynamic design to deliver maximum power and performance.

The Dark Horse maximizes the power potential of a lightweight and energetic board in a budget friendly construction. It delivers the pop and power, demanded by progressive freestyle riders through its tried and trusted combination of a Dual Core™ and Special Blend Fiberglass while it's further enhanced with 2 x 30 mm Carbon Aramid Boosters.

products.title: THE BLACK SNOWBOARD OF DEATH
products.body_html:
The Black Snowboard of Death has achieved legendary status as an all-terrain slayer, boasting an impressive collection of accolades. Over the last 25 years, it has undergone constant evolution and modification in the relentless pursuit of perfection. The one constant amidst these changes has been its iconic name.

Featuring a finely balanced directional shape and high-powered construction, this custom-designed rocketship offers exceptional control, enabling riders to elevate their skills and navigate varying terrain and changing conditions with confidence.

This iconic CAPiTA series is packed with technology—integrating a Thermopolymer Hover Core™ with Carbon Fleece Power Shields™ and Carbonflax™ Amplifiers for a high-powered construction which allows for incredible control.

products.title: OUTERSPACE LIVING
products.body_html:
The Outerspace Living features a true-twin freestyle shape blended with an all-terrain camber profile built for freeriding. Inspired by the award-winning Mercury series, positive camber lies underfoot for power retention while an elevated nose and tail help the board swim through variable conditions.

Do you want to crush laps through the park after the powder is tracked out? If so, then this is the board for you.

products.title: INDOOR SURVIVAL
products.body_html: The Indoor Survival is a standout performer both at the resort and in the park. It achieves this through its innovative Meta Core™ and Titanal Centerline Booster, which provide exceptional underfoot responsiveness while maintaining a lightweight construction. Furthermore, the Indoor Survival features the New Age Twin shape with Death Grip™, allowing you to maximize its carving prowess, enhancing your experience on the slopes.

products.title: AERONAUT
products.body_html:
Prepare to blast-off with the groundbreaking Aeronaut series, a creation born from the visionary mind of the side-hit maestro and Rocket Man extraordinaire, Arthur Longo.

This directional, cambered masterpiece is your ticket to conquering all-mountain challenges with blazing speed and jaw-dropping airtime. Redefine the limits of your local resort’s terrain as you soar into the realm of Side Hit Euphoria™, courtesy of the Aeronaut by Arthur Longo.

Designed to charge the resort and sidecountry hits like Arthur, this series combines a lightweight and extremely durable Panda Hover Core™ with CarbonFlax™ Amplifiers for tons of pop. The high-speed performance of the Aeronaut was upgraded in 2025 with an all-new, tougher, HyperDrive™ ADV XT base.

Arthur Longo Pro Model

products.title: KAZU KOKUBO PRO
products.body_html:
Fast and powerful, this is the switchblade of powder boards.

The Kazu Kokubo Pro comes in a compact chassis with a powder nose and a slightly tapered tail, making this award-winning series quick and maneuverable.

This versatility is perfect for side-country powder mornings that transition to resort riding after you've tracked your secret stash. And, while it's a lofty goal, this board is your first step towards trying to emulate Kazu's legendary style.

products.title: PARADISE
products.body_html:
These perfectly balanced all-terrain freeride boards are stable and supportive—yet forgiving and easy to ride at the same time. Featuring camber underfoot for controlled turns and a rockered nose and tail that floats in powder, the Paradise is the perfect board to cruise side-country powder in the morning and laps through the park in the afternoon.

The Paradise delivers unmatched versatility in a lightweight package with the Multizone Dual Core™ at its heart. The Paradise solidifies its place as the go-to series for intermediate resort riders looking to boost their riding to the next level.

products.title: SB STAIRMASTER
products.body_html:
A legend in CAPiTA history, the Stairmaster debuted as a tough and affordable option for freestyle snowboarders holding a more skate-style mentality to product. With a purist approach, they wanted a simple yet proven construction with no unnecessary additives—and they wanted to buy it at a price that made sense knowing it will be ridden hard. The graphic direction was led by Corey Smith, and before long, the Stairmaster became a rider favorite. In fact, it was one of our most widely ridden boards for years.

For 25/26, the Stairmaster is back. This time under the Spring Break Snowboards umbrella, once again aesthetically curated and under the creative direction of Dr. Smith.

products.title: SB RESORT TWIN
products.body_html:
The Spring Break Resort Twin aligns the unique vibe of Spring Break tropical snowboarding with a proper twin freestyle shape aimed at the masses. 

With waist-widths more in-line with conventional freestyle and resort snowboards and an iconic twin silhouette respectful of its big brother, the S.B. Powder Twin, these are your everyday resort shreds for fans of Spring Break. With a Meta Core™, Carbon V-Tech Amplifiers, and a HolySheet™ Tri/Bi Fiberglass configuration the Spring Break Resort Twin delivers the pop and power demanded by freestyle park and resort riders.

products.title: ULTRAFEAR
products.body_html:
The Ultrafear has carved out a legendary position as one of the greatest jib and park boards in the world. For 2026 we’ve brought back its original shape for a retro take on this award-winning design.

Loaded with technical attributes that exceed its price tag, this series is ready to help you unlock new tricks and new features at your resort all winter long.

With a P2 Superlight Core™, 1.5mm Full Cork Edge Dampening System, and an all new Hybrid HolySheet™ directly interwoven with tip-to-tail Carbon Boosters, the reshaped Ultrafear is loaded with high-end technical attributes and delivers the ollie power and stability coveted by freestyle riders.

products.title: PATHFINDER
products.body_html:
The Pathfinder is the perfect board for a wide range of riders looking to progress their riding at a minimal cost. It is fun, manueverable, easy to ride and capable of big things.

The Pathfinder provides a user-friendly and confident chassis for riders new to the game, with plenty of upside for intermediate or advanced park riders looking for a value-packed opportunity for their next freestyle-focused resort board.

The Pathfinder excels in a variety of resort and freestyle terrain with the tried and trusted combination of a Dual Core™ and Special Blend Fiberglass + Magic Bean™ Resin.

products.title: THE EQUALIZER BY JESS KIMURA
products.body_html:
Inspired by Jess Kimura's progression from the streets to the backcountry, The Equalizer was born to level the playing field on the mountain and offer riders a high-end all-mountain option designed specifically for women.

The series now features an updated custom-designed hybrid camber profile, providing positive camber through the inserts for carving control, while reverse camber in the nose and tail maximizes float in powder.

The Equalizer's ride and response comes from its META Core™ to achieve a desirable flex for all-mountain terrain, while Technora™ Flax Boosters provide longitudinal power. Featuring a Quantum Drive™ high-speed sintered base, The Equalizer is one of the most technically advanced women's freeride boards on the market.

products.title: SPACE METAL FANTASY
products.body_html:
The award winning Space Metal Fantasy is widely regarded as one of the best women's park boards on the market. However, to be fair, labeling it as a park board severely understates its potential.

We present this as a park series for classification purposes, but in truth, it's much more than that. The Space Metal Fantasy is fun for carving around the slopes, playing on features in the park, and even floats ridiculously well in powder.

This very forgiving reverse camber shape provides a fun experience for beginner to intermediate riders looking to expedite the learning curve and take their riding to the next level on many different types of terrain. The S.M.F. is a vehicle for progression and can excel in any riding environment without breaking the bank.

products.title: SB SLUSH SLASHERS
products.body_html:
The Slush Slasher is the playful mini-park and powder ripper that changed the game.

This innovative short-board rails turns on the groomers, transition, and in the park, and it's as fun on jibs as it is in the deep stuff. This board is sure to change your perspective on any terrain and put a smile on even the grumpiest skeptics.

The elongated nose plows over anything in its path, while its Vacation Tail lets you put these snow sharks on cruise control. With the Slush Slasher, the world is your seven-day weekend.

products.title: SB POWDER TWIN
products.body_html:
This ain't no business-in-the-front and party-in-the-back type product. It's all business and all party, and it's like that all the time.

With a rarely seen symmetrical approach to party boarding, we present you with the Spring Break Powder Twin. Yep, it looks like a twin-tip park board but guess what? It retains many of the geometric theories that have made Spring Break Snowboards legendary in powder—and on the corduroy.

Perfect for a freestyler living in a powder zone or just a larger rider having a hard time finding a wide-enough twin, the Powder Twin will deliver. Featuring a super-wide chassis, a Surf Camber Twin profile for maximum flotation, and all-new META Core™, the S.B.P.T. has the signature Spring Break super-tight six-meter sidecut to surf the waves and slash the goods.

products.title: SB POWDER RACERS
products.body_html:
The Spring Break Powder Racers utilize one of the best-selling shapes from the sought-after Spring Break Ultralight Archives with a more accessibly priced construction. Utilizing a large surface area to increase floatation and deep sidecuts to carve up the slopes, the Powder Racers produce party vibes in powder and on groomers alike.

The Powder Racers achieves its easier-on-the-wallet, lightweight construction with a Hover Core™ and Technora™ Flax Boosters, while unlocking super flotation performance with a wide-framed nose in a directional shape with tons of taper.

products.title: SB POWDER GLIDER
products.body_html:
The Spring Break Powder Gliders align an advanced shaping theory from deep paradise and technical performance construction from The MotherShip into a backcountry game-changer. With a wide-framed nose, directional shape, and tons of taper, these boards will float through the deepest pow and deliver in your search for endless tropical turns.

The Powder Glider is built with a premium Surflite 4.0 Core and Carbon Fleece Power Shield for ultralight weight toughness. Combined with a wide-framed nose and directional shape with tons of taper, the ultimate floatation performance is achieved.

products.title: THE NAVIGATOR
products.body_html:
Riding powder is like hiking into a backcountry camping trip. Once you're past the trailhead, if you have the right gear, there's nothing better. If you packed the wrong kit, there's nothing worse. The Navigator is your fire starter; it is your unwavering compass. It is essential to the experience.

This powder-annihilating series features a parabolic sidecut and a sinking tapered tail to swim through the soft stuff while the wide-frame rockered nose naturally floats above deep snow. The resulting shape transforms tiring powder days into emotionally fulfilling outdoor experiences.

products.title: THE NAVIGATOR WMN
products.body_html:
Riding powder is like hiking into a backcountry camping trip. Once you're past the trailhead, if you have the right gear, there's nothing better. If you packed the wrong kit, there's nothing worse. The Navigator is your fire starter; it is your unwavering compass. It is essential to the experience.

This powder-annihilating series features a parabolic sidecut and a sinking tapered tail to swim through the soft stuff while the wide-frame rockered nose naturally floats above deep snow. The resulting shape transforms tiring powder days into emotionally fulfilling outdoor experiences.

products.title: MEGA SPLIT
products.body_html:
Inspired by the renowned Mercury shape, and the MEGA MERC’s high-end construction attributes, the MEGA SPLIT is custom engineered to be one of the lightest-weight and best-performing splitboards in the world. Unlock worlds of new terrain and endless adventures with the MEGA SPLIT.

The ultralight Mega Split is powered by a 3D Ascend Split Core™, Pure MEGACARBON™, and a new MEGADRIVE™ XT with Moonshot Omni-Tune™ making this the greatest performing, featherlight construction in the industry.

splitboard skins

products.title: NAVIGATOR SPLIT
products.body_html:
The Navigator, known as a powder-annihilating favorite of the CAPiTA collection, is now available in a factory-direct split for the first time. This highly anticipated touring option of a side-country slayer will help unlock new terrain out of bounds or skin up your favorite resort line when uphill travel is allowed.

This series provides lightweight, controlled ascents with camber running underfoot and slight rockers at the contact points while the parabolic sidecut and sinking tapered tail permits effortless float and smooth turns on the descent.

The Navigator Split is a value-drive tool for unlocking endless pow stashes and epic-level experiences.

products.title: NAVIGATOR WMN SPLIT
products.body_html:
The Navigator, known as a powder-annihilating favorite of the CAPiTA collection, is now available in a factory-direct split for the first time. This highly anticipated touring option of a side-country slayer will help unlock new terrain out of bounds or skin up your favorite resort line when uphill travel is allowed.

This series provides lightweight, controlled ascents with camber running underfoot and slight rockers at the contact points while the parabolic sidecut and sinking tapered tail permits effortless float and smooth turns on the descent.

The Navigator Split is a value-drive tool for unlocking endless pow stashes and epic-level experiences.

products.title: CHILDREN OF THE GNAR
products.body_html:
Designed as a “tween-age” destroyer, these boards form a bridge between the boys and men. It’s here where the kids start riding better than their parents if that hasn’t happened already. Although this series is very forgiving and promotes skill-building, it is no toy. The Children of the Gnar is the go-anywhere, do-anything freestyle deck for young shredders during those in-between years.

With a camber profile inspired by the award winning D.O.A. series and a Select Core 2.0™ in combination with a fast, yet easy to maintain XXX[TRUDED]™ base, the Children of the Gnar has the power, pop and durability required for progressive youth riders.

products.title: CHILDREN OF THE POW
products.body_html:
The Children of the Pow is designed as a powder-specific youth board for the next-gen. It is specifically for the ‘tween-age’ young guns ready to seek side-country slashes and epic pow stashes; it’s for younger riders who want more float and a board designed for powder. With a progressive shape, and a camber profile inspired by the notorious Spring Break Snowboards series, the Children of the Pow will open worlds of new terrain for young shredders during those in-between years.

The Children Of The Pow provides ultimate floatation and glide thanks to its Surf Rocker profile combined with the Select 2.0 Core™, and a fast, yet easy to maintain XXX[TRUDED]™ Base with Special Blend Fiberglass.

products.title: JESS KIMURA MINI
products.body_html:
Back again, The Jess Kimura Mini is the mini-shred rad girl model designed to bridge the gap between the Micro Mini and the smallest sizes of the mainline ladies’ boards. Produced at The MotherShip™ utilizing clean energy while featuring reforestation-certified sustainable woodcores, these boards are packed with technology at a price parents can afford. Snappy, soft, and designed with a slight reverse camber and beveled shape, they’re everything you’ve come to expect from a CAPiTA in a simplified, scaled-down form.

This construction utilizes a Select 2.0 Core™ in combination with a fast, yet easy to maintain XXX[TRUDED]™ base, providing a durable yet lightweight board to allow girls to play on fun stuff like park jumps, bumps, boxes, and freestyle terrain.

products.title: SCOTT STEVENS MINI
products.body_html:
This mini-shred model is designed to bridge the gap between the Micro Mini and the smallest sizes of the mainline boards.

Produced at The MotherShip™, utilizing clean energy while featuring reforestation-certified sustainable woodcores, these boards are packed with technology at a price parents can afford. Combine that with fan-favorite graphics from Scott Steven’s pro model archives and the inspiration from the legend himself, and you have an incredible youth board to fuel progression for groms.

This construction utilizes a Select 2.0 Core™ in combination with a fast, yet easy to maintain XXX[TRUDED]™ base, providing a durable yet lightweight board to allow groms to play on fun stuff like park jumps, bumps, boxes, and freestyle terrain.

products.title: MICRO MINI
products.body_html:
The Micro Mini is the perfect board for kids getting their first experiences in the snowboarding game.

With a target age range from 2 years old on the 80, and upward of 8 years old on the 110, these are great learning boards when the length of the board reflects a range approximately between the distance from the floor to the rider's chin and brow.

With a custom engineered design to ensure ease of use, the Micro Mini is the ideal board for early turning and learning experiences.

products.title: MIA BROOKES PRO
products.body_html: An easy-to-ride freestyle destroyer for those looking to take their riding to new heights, the Mia Brookes Pro is built on the time-tested, podium-proven Birds of a Feather geometry and chassis, with an upgraded ultralight Hover Core™, and Hyperdrive™ ADV base for speed.

products.title: Darkhorse 154 Austin Vizz LTD
products.body_html:
The Dark Horse is a new wallet-friendly iteration of the team-favorite Outsiders that crushes park jumps, side hits, and freestyle features. Pared down with only technical components you need in an array of standard and wide sizes – Dark Horse leverages its dynamic design to deliver maximum power and performance.

The Dark Horse maximizes the power potential of a lightweight and energetic board in a budget friendly construction. It delivers the pop and power, demanded by progressive freestyle riders through its tried and trusted combination of a Dual Core™ and Special Blend Fiberglass while it's further enhanced with 2 x 30 mm Carbon Aramid Boosters.

products.title: D.O.A. 154 Benny Milam LTD
Navigator 158 Miles Fallon LTD
products.body_html:
Riding powder is like hiking into a backcountry camping trip. Once you're past the trailhead, if you have the right gear, there's nothing better. If you packed the wrong kit, there's nothing worse. The Navigator is your fire starter; it is your unwavering compass. It is essential to the experience.

This powder-annihilating series features a parabolic sidecut and a sinking tapered tail to swim through the soft stuff while the wide-frame rockered nose naturally floats above deep snow. The resulting shape transforms tiring powder days into emotionally fulfilling outdoor experiences.

products.title: THE MATRIARCH
products.body_html:
Unlock aspirational precision and natural terrain flow with The Matriarch—a snowboard shaped by the mind of Torstein Horgmo.

This directional cambered offering is built for riders who see the mountain not just for what it is, but for what it could be: a place where freestyle creativity meets the expanse of backcountry possibilities.

With explosive pop, dynamic control, and effortless float, The Matriarch thrives on natural features and diverse snowpack. From backcountry transitions to in-bound powder laps and variable all-mountain conditions, it blurs the line between instinct and intention—inviting riders to draw their own lines with power, style, and purpose.

Inspired by the transition from park to powder through a shared freestyle and freeriding mindset—The Matriarch provides the ability to slay the local park and stand confident at the drop-in at Natural Selection™. Introducing the new Transcend Core™ and Fairmat™ carbon amplifiers, this lightweight and agile chassis offers maximum control and versatility through varied conditions.
